text: Komi Sélom Klassou (born February 10, 1960List of ministers in the 2006-2007 government , etiame.com .List of 2007 candidates in Haho Prefecture, CENI website .) is a Togolese politician. He was the Prime Minister of Togo from 2015 to 2020. He was born in the commune of Notsé, in Haho. He has a university degree in geography and is a doctor in hydro-climatology. He occupied the ministries of Culture, Youth, Sport and Education and then vice- presidency of the National Assembly before being appointed Prime Minister on June 5, 2015, by President Faure Gnassingbé, following the presidential election. He formed his government of 22 members (including 4 women) after his election and made the list public on June 28, 2015. == References == Category:1960 births Category:Prime ministers of Togo Category:Living people
title: Komi Sélom Klassou
